long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LeetHide is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your LeetCode experience by allowing you to hide specific elements on the page. This extension helps streamline your focus by letting you toggle the visibility of the following elements:

Difficulty: Hide or show the difficulty level of the problem.
Acceptance Rate: Hide or show the acceptance rate of the problem.
Topics/Tags: Hide or show the topics/tags associated with the problem.
Solution: Hide or show the solution section.

Key Features:
Persistent Settings: Settings are saved across sessions, so your preferences will persist even after refreshing the page.
Easy-to-Use Interface: Simply click on the toggle switches to hide or reveal the different sections.
Quick Access: Easily access the developer's LinkedIn profile from the footer section of the popup.

How to Use:
Install the extension and open LeetCode.
Click on the extension icon to open the popup.
Use the toggle switches to hide or show the different sections on LeetCode.
Refresh the page for the changes to take effect.
Enjoy a more focused and customized LeetCode experience with LeetHide!
